title: Speed of center of mass after explosion-symbolic

content.prompt: Two identical blocks are connected to the opposite ends of a compressed spring. The blocks initially slide together on a frictionless surface with velocity v to the right. The spring is then released by remote control. At some later instant, the left block is moving at v/2 to the left, and the other block is moving to the right. What is the speed of the center of mass of the system at that instant?

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
